website_summaries.verdict: A well-contained grill that uses infrared heat coils to grill food without all the smoke.
pros: True-infrared electric cooking system roasts food evenly and prevents flare-ups
Rust-resistant grates made of cast iron and porcelain clean easily
cons: Loses significant heat when you open the grill

customer_reviews.title: A superior product when assembled
customer_reviews.text: A superior product when assembled, but the assembly instructions are terribly inadequate. I am an engineer and it took three hours to finish. The fasteners are not identified so you are forced to try them and guess at what washers are appropriate. There are no written instructions or photos, just line drawings. I am pleased with the quality of the grill after assembly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bloomer

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted. - Update!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great little patio grill. Living in a condo, electric is my only option. It cooked all foods great & I used it a lot, but it didn't even last a year! So, 2 stars for good while it lasted. So....as it turns out, this baby is still going!! A little electrical trouble that was remedied & we are BACK IN BUSINESS!! So happy! While others said it didn't get hot enough, mine consistently reached 400-500 when required. Maybe because I live in the South & it's just hot outside! :) I've cooked everything from vegetables, shrimp, pork chops, steak & of course the obligatory chicken breast. It cooks evenly & succulently. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DFIEHA

customer_reviews.title: What a fantastic grill! I use it on my apartment balcony ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow. What a fantastic grill! I use it on my apartment balcony where flames are forbidden. Very little smoke is produced. Fat drippings are neatly collected in a tray. It makes the best grilled bacon I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Nevins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Instructions and Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Packaging: Excellent Instructions and Assembly: Easy to Read & Easy to assemble Construction: Well made for the cost Performance: Reaches 550 degrees and holds its steady. Just do not open the lid too often because it loses heat quickly. We are very pleased with our purchase of the Char Broil Elec. Patio Bistro Grille
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Good Alternative
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative for those who cannot carry propane tanks around or condo regs don’t allow propane use. Need to preheat for 15 minutes and then it cooks the food fairly quickly. Flip up shelves are excellent addition to original design which allows for compact storage. Holds 10 chicken breasts. Rolls easily.
customer_reviews.author: MAmom

customer_reviews.title: my patio jewel!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! for one or 2 people it does the job and very practical. I don't like gas grills since they scare me as I already had a bad experience it almost blowing off my face... I had a bbq for 18 people 2 weeks ago and I was able to cook burgers and hot dogs for all guest as well as grilling pre-cooked chicken and ribs. very easy to clean and small enough to fit covered on a corner in my patio. received many compliments on my new cute grill!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this grill! It cooks perfectly! I don't cook things that have a lot of grease in them because it will create a flare up like pork steaks but chicken wings are fine! It's juicy ...and not dried out. I like something's crispy on the outside and this grill does the trick. I have it inside of a standing tent room and haven't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Zigwall

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the summer
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would enjoy an electric grill. BUT I love my Char-Broil TRU infrared grill so much. Easy to use, just plug it in and let it heat to desired temp. Place meat or veggies in the grill and let it do its thing. Perfect taste every time. This is the perfect grill for a single person or a couple, if your cooking for more than 2 it struggles to keep up. You can cook for 4 as long as your not placing large items or a lot of items on the grill. I use this grill atleast 3 times a week. I love grilling on it, best purchase of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Dbsylvia

customer_reviews.title: Best Apartment Cooking!!!
customer_reviews.text: The grill arrived and was tough to put together... it till me an hour and patience... lol The quality of the grill was heavy, I was super pleased with the heavy quality. It looks sharp, clean and fun to use... See these pictures below!! Ready to grill again tonight.. Apartment Balcony Dinner....
customer_reviews.author: Tony Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap flimsy pile of crap.....would not buy a charbroil product again.....screw all stripped out easy, didn’t even use my dewalt....
customer_reviews.author: wkham

customer_reviews.title: Grill time
customer_reviews.text: Works OK, but I need it at highest setting for everything. And double your normal cook times. It does seem to finish with good, juicy meats. I found the hotter spots on the grill and take advantage of it. When I use barbecue sauce, it clogs the narrow grill openings which slows down the cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Watercolorwilly

customer_reviews.title: Slow cooking and or burnt food.
customer_reviews.text: Less flare ups... I just watched the grill go up to 725 degrees that’s right rolled around the dial once due to a flare up. Dam thing flares up all the time and i keep it clean. If you leave the shell open for more than 2 minutes you lose 50-75 degrees instantly and takes longer to cook.
customer_reviews.author: D'Angelo Family

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to a gas grill for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleasantly surprised at how well this grill cooks. As long as you leave enough time for warmup and set the appropriate cooking temperature, the result will be very good. Pay attention to preparing the cooking grate so the food won’t stick and cleanup will be a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a bbq, it’s an ez bake oven.
customer_reviews.text: It more/less “bakes” your steak. Barely a sizzle when you lay it on the grill. The $80 George Foreman grill works waaaay better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUT this grill is just as great as charcoal
customer_reviews.text: We grill at least 5 days a week living in Key West, FL, we cannot have charcoal, which Dave prefers, BUT this grill is just as great as charcoal. We use planks to adjust the heat if you're looking to use certain parts for a cooler temp. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: David Decheine

customer_reviews.title: Impossible assembly
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 3 of these grills over the past 10+ years. First 2 were perfect to assemble and 100% satisfied. This third "improved" unit will be useless due to plastic leg supports not aligning with metal legs unless spend time and or money to fabricate new leg supports. There were other minor misalignments elsewhere. The construction manual, on the other hand, is one of the best I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for electric.
customer_reviews.text: Make no mistake, electric grills are not a replacement for gas or charcoal. This was necessary to comply with neighborhood restrictions. It will heat up to about 450 degrees. Unfortunately it dips down to around 300 when you start to cook and recovers slowly. Leaving it on high works for nearly everything. Once I got used to the limitations of an electric grill, I like using it and am getting good results. Just don’t expect char.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Falcone

customer_reviews.title: You have to be Mechanically Inclined to put this together!!
customer_reviews.text: Installation instructions are poor at best. Grill is great-- but if you have to put it together-- a box puzzle would be more fun! Also you need some extra washers and nuts from your workshop or you are going to come up sort in putting this unit together.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Treker

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: I liked this small electric grill for the purpose intended. I use it on my little balcony in my apartment and it fits perfectly. Assembly was easy and using it is even easier. Be aware that as an electric grill, it really takes a while to heat properly. Keep it closed and make sure you reach a steady 450-500 F before opening and start grilling. The moment you open the grill most heat will be dissipated. I use it to sear my sous vide cooked steaks, fish and chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Alex F. Lazo

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: We have had 3 of these grills and used them until they were wore out. This was delivered missing an end cap cover and a chunk out of the grill. I spoke to customer support and was offered 20% refund. Grill works great..just expected it to be new.
customer_reviews.author: DeannaM

customer_reviews.title: Clean it before each use
customer_reviews.text: Kinda wish they made the coil removable to make it easy clean the grill. Other than that it has been working great!
customer_reviews.author: HNP

customer_reviews.title: It takes a while to come to temperature.
customer_reviews.text: It took quite a while for the unit to come up to temperature but once there did the job. I’ve only used it once so I don’t really have a lot of knowledge. I put it together in about an hour, no problem. I did keep tripping the electric circuit but that probably had more to do with the house wiring and the fact that I was trying to dry my hair at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Jan A

customer_reviews.title: a pulling around handle.
customer_reviews.text: it was easy putting it together.Instructions are easy,just take the step at a time, as it says.They only thing ,no handle to move it from one place to another.It needs that to hang on the front so a person does not have it go from underneath you. .We want to put it outside in the summer and inside the garage for the winter cooking. It is beautiful. No shipping on it and no taxes, what a good deal . Would have taxes from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: mollydog191

customer_reviews.title: Nice little grill but the temperature drops off quickly
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this electric grill but when you open the cover, the temperature inside drops quickly. The assembly was difficult and you need to be patient. Do not lose any screws :) Also one of the side tiny plastic next to the cover broke off easily. Other than that, I love this grill for my condo on the 12th floor!
customer_reviews.author: Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Great for places that don’t allow a gas grill
customer_reviews.text: I love this little Grill. It fits nicely on my patio heater up fairly quickly and does a good job of cooking. Make no mistake, this is not a gas grill and therefore does not cook as a gas grill. It takes longer. Once I figured that out and made adjustments to my grilling times its done a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: The grill I’ve been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like flames, gas and charcoal, BUT I do enjoy a nice summer dinner with grilled food. This is the perfect grill for my little family. I can operate it on my own without assistance from my husband. I simply plug it in and start cooking without any safety or fire concerns. And, the best part is that it’s super easy to clean. I highly recommend this little gem for authentic and stress-free grilling!
customer_reviews.author: CelN

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good little unit for an electric grill.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking unit, nice storage and easy to use. Assembly was so-so, but completed in about 40 minutes. My only concern is a blemish / rub-mark on one of the fold out trays. Probably from packaging and travel. No apparent damage was visible on the box.
customer_reviews.author: RCCleven

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill but temperature control not good
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this grill and the smaller space needed on the porch/patio; however, it doesn't leave grilling marks on the meat and it doesn't get hot enough to sear in the juices so the meat is dry. Also, it takes much longer to cook. I have since purchased a smaller gas grill that uses the regular size 15 lb. propane tank which I was trying to avoid due to my age prohibiting the lifting of a full tank of propane easily but it just didn't work out the way I had hoped. I will still use it for other things while using my gas grill at the same time but I don't recommend it for cooking meat.
customer_reviews.author: Doris H.

customer_reviews.title: You will never want to BBQ with charcoal or propane again!
customer_reviews.text: This incredible infrared electric grill is absolutely amazing to BBQ with. No open flames, no flare-ups, no hassle regulating coal/wood temperatures, no running out of propane. Infrared allows you to precisely dial in the temperature and maintain it for hours! Gets hot enough to sear, then dial it back for a medium roasting temperature or slow cook ribs, brisket at 250 degrees for hours, like a pro. Unlike any other type of grill, and more like an oven, a thermostat regulates the temperature with little or no attention. I have not cooked any meals indoors since I bought it a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: Four stars
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of both side trays came broken, one fell completely off and can’t be screwed back on. Other than that I’m pleased with this product so far. Our townhome association no longer allows gas or charcoal grills and this is a nice alternative for people who love to grill.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M.

customer_reviews.title: A unique, fast, and clean way to cook outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent grill if you like juicy steaks....done to you liking...without burning. Putting it together is a 2 person job.
customer_reviews.author: Artz 3

customer_reviews.title: Should mostly be used indoors turn on its own  circuit
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. But it drawers excessive amperage and needs to be on its own circuit at minimum. And if you use it outdoors it is hard to keep the temperature up if it is cool or breezy.
customer_reviews.author: John Holland

customer_reviews.title: ASSEMBLY DIFFICULT AND TIME CONSUMING
customer_reviews.text: OMG-I had no idea that there would be so pieces with this grill. Assembly is difficult-not worth it. I may return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when we closed in our porch. Codes do not allow gas grills on enclosed porches and there is just my wife and I now. This grill does an outstanding job and I will not miss getting propane bottles filled.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiajack

customer_reviews.title: Easiest grill we ever assembled
customer_reviews.text: It was the easiest grill we ever assembled. We followed the picture directions and it took an hour. Easy and no arguing lol. Heated up in about 10 minutes to 500 degrees. Looking forward to cooking many burgers. I'll update if needed
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Fink

customer_reviews.title: You have to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that I had to assemble it. I am at an age that assembling items for use is no longer appealing. I have not used the Char-broil much but what I have cooked turned out well. The highest temperature is 550f and 300c. If you need the burners screaming hot set the gauge a temp or two higher becouse when you lift the lid the temp drops considerably.
customer_reviews.author: glorydaz

customer_reviews.title: Big Red Infrared
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill. It was easy to put together yet it is very sturdy and secure. I have a limited space so the side tables that fold down are a game changer. The tru infrared cooks evenly and on point. Love my Big Red
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It may not heat up so fast and the temperature knob is easily bumped to a different temp. But you don’t have to mess with gas! Food cooks nicely. It is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Anne

customer_reviews.title: It's not gas or charcoal, it's electric!!  The best!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want a gas or charcoal grill. This is just perfect! Easy to turn on, easy to clean, and easy to grill upon! Plus, it's easy on the eyes....just adorable to look at! Also, it's a perfect size. It answered all my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Large grilling surface
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. In fact I bought one for a friend. I live in a condo and the bylaws state only electric. We cooked 8 chicken thighs at once. The secret is to let the grill get up to temperature before starting to grill.
customer_reviews.author: denise madigan

customer_reviews.title: Assembly difficult.
customer_reviews.text: The grill looks good and grills fine but the assembly is extremely difficult. Poor instructions, few parts missing, took me 8 hours to assemble and I am an engineer!
customer_reviews.author: Lem

customer_reviews.title: I had hoped for better
customer_reviews.text: Miserable to assemble by myself. Tripped my circuit breaker the first time I used it, which I didn’t realize until I went to turn the steak. Temperature had lost 125 degrees
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The Char-Broil has many special attributes, and it looks nice, too. I love the side shelves. They are very easy to raise up- you can leave them down or put one up or both. Makes it so convenient to set your cooking items right next to you as you grill. I also like the easy to read temperature gauge on the lid as well as the storage shelf under the grill.
customer_reviews.author: NK Sands

customer_reviews.title: Love my grill!!!
customer_reviews.text: I found the assembly pretty easy and the quality to be very good. I use it very often and have wonderful results. I didn't want a gas grill because the open flame scares me, being a single mom. So this electric grill was the perfect option for me! It cooks meat evenly and fast. Pork chops have never tasted better than now! Highly recommend !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally E. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Tricky to assemble. They do make the parts shaped where you have to do it correctly but it took two of us, lol Will add some lava rocks under element for flavor smoke.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: Condo grilling
customer_reviews.text: We live in condo with requirements for electric grill. This provided more wattage and larger grilling space with a sturdy base
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Searle

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: In apartment where no propane is allowed....excellent quality...and works perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Danger of fire
customer_reviews.text: I used this grill for 3 times. The third time it went on fire. I was very scared and had to use water to stop the fire. The 2 first times I used, was ok and I cleaned after use. The picture of a dirty grill that you see is the result of the burning incident. Lost my meal and I will discard this grill. Don’t want run the risk of fire again. Lost of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little grill.
customer_reviews.text: Cooks great! Would have been nice if it wasn’t as involved as it was to assemble. So many pieces, bolts, and nuts. Been nice if all holes lined up.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Wallace

customer_reviews.title: NOT SO HOT
customer_reviews.text: Does not get as hot as I would like. You have to heat it up for 20minutes and when you add your steak it cools down 15 deg. I am not able to lift a propane tank so this works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dowgiala

customer_reviews.title: High quality grill
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. Yes, it was a bit hard to assemble, but that is because it is a quality made grill and the parts had to go together in just the right sequence. Otherwise, it cooks great, is well built and looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking grill!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking grill. Looking forward to using it. It arrived with a broken tray so I had to contact Char-Broil for a part. Only wish the part would get here as fast as Amazon Prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Hanson

customer_reviews.title: 👍💕
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loved it for last Father's day! Wifey loves getting help cooking dinner! Win win! 😁
customer_reviews.author: TinkerBelle

customer_reviews.title: Infrared coil gives out after so many uses at least mine did
customer_reviews.text: This is second unit I have purchased the first one lasted about 1 year and I was happy with it but the infrared coil just stopped working. The second one lasted only April 19-August 9, 2019 with the infrared coil just quoting again. I love how they work but won’t be purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: John R Farrenkopf

customer_reviews.title: BBQ is awesome. Heat is superior than other similar brands
customer_reviews.text: BBQ is awesome. Heat is superior than other similar brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Menke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect grill for my deck. Cooks great. I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: mbiam72

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: It's big enough, but yet compact. Heats up quickly and cooks evenly . It's really nice not worrying about propane or charcoal, just plug it in and go.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Okay overall
customer_reviews.text: Great for a electric grill but the lights around knob just went out after maybe 9 uses and that's sad..
customer_reviews.author: Richard.

customer_reviews.title: Great electric grill
customer_reviews.text: My condo only permits me to have an electric grill, so I purchased this one. I am so happy with it! It works great and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reached 500 F with no problem
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The assembly was easy and everything was marked. Plug it in and waited 20 minutes. Checked the temp and it was at 500. I will update after I cook something on it. Update Cooked hot dogs and Bubba Burgers with a chunk of hickory on the grate. Meal came out pretty good. Easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gary

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: Could have been a better instruction booklet. Would have made me happier. It has a very nice look to it and the heating element worked, but haven't cooked on yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is perfect for our dock at the lake. Great quality and performance!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Drury

customer_reviews.title: Won't heat higher than 235 degrees.
customer_reviews.text: It was a hot day in Oklahoma today when I used our new grill for the first time. I could not get it to heat higher than 235 degrees! I won't be able to use this on my porch when the weather turns cold. It will necer get hot enough. Constructed from nice materual/love the red color. Wish it would heat up HOTTER!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good compact grill that cooks as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s working great! Took a little time to get use to how quickly it cooked. Make sure to preheat unless you want your food steamed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It cooks amazingly fast, chars the meat, heats up quickly . Dial on lid lets you know temperature. Grate comes off to wash in sink! More expensive than George Foreman brand, but truly worth expense!
customer_reviews.author: D Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Cooks Great. Love the stand😍.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Heat up fast. When it opens heat is lost. Love the way it cooks. Hope it last more than two years.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good quality grill; flip up sides not needed.
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the product. Just don't have any use for the flip up sides which we don't need and take up too much space. The vendor should make them optional.
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG C. PUTNAM

customer_reviews.title: Give yourself plenty of time to put this together
customer_reviews.text: The Charbroil itself is a nice product. I was not expecting to have to assemble everything. The flame guard on the lid needs more instructions and the instructions themselves along with pictures could be more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good unit when it works.
customer_reviews.text: It works very good, when it works, In a matter on a year and a half, broke twice, somehow the burner brakes and it won’t work, like I said above when it works is a good product , but brakes to easily.
customer_reviews.author: Febo Medina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartment
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for small apartment patio! Would recommend a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill fast easy
customer_reviews.text: I've used Char-Broil Electric grills for many years and I like the way food cooks and tastes.
customer_reviews.author: T. P.

customer_reviews.title: Parts not available for 1 yr old grill!!!!????
customer_reviews.text: Used this product just a few times. Temperature control ceased to function, now won't come on at all. I have tried order the parts, and they are unavailable from the manufacturer. Not having any luck in aftermarket either.
customer_reviews.author: henry j lambert iii

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product!!!! Easy assembly. Live in an apartment now and gas/charcoal not allowed. This electric grill does just as good a job as the other grills I have had. Easy clean up great taste!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this grill. The heating element developed a hole after just five (5) uses. Also their warenty is not applicable if you buy on eBay.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Gustavson

customer_reviews.title: Another cooking tool for me
customer_reviews.text: Only got to use it once, so from that experience, i would say it meet my needs
customer_reviews.author: HMJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor temp control
customer_reviews.text: Submitted 2 questions to vendor that the grill heats to 450, once I add food it drops to 200. Takes 30+ minutes to cook a 6oz steak. They closed both my tickets with no resolution. Have called support many times and on hold for 40+ minutes
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Char-Broil TRU Infrared Electric Patio Grill
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy grill, has weight to it. The construction gives you the feeling that this is made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Ron V.

customer_reviews.title: Grill isn’t durable.  Stopped working after 2 years of light use.
customer_reviews.text: Grill worked well, but then it stopped working after only 2 years of light use. Grill was covered by custom grill cover when not in use. Expect better durability from Char Broil.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S Strassburger

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need !
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this grill ! Met my expectations! Thank you for such product !
customer_reviews.author: cora hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Gets properly hot and does a good job
customer_reviews.text: If your situation does not permit gas or charcoal, this unit is a very satisfactory alternative.
customer_reviews.author: James N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: using this every day. easier than gas I trust. quite, large, strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: K. Miyajima

customer_reviews.title: Really like the grill
customer_reviews.text: This electric grill has side platforms to hold plates etc
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but will dry out your meats before they get cooked.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice, goes together very well. But like many electric units it’s very difficult to keep hot enough to cook and not dry out foods. The older version of the charbroil work much better.
customer_reviews.author: C. Maples

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems to heat up pretty quickly and cooked food evenly. it's not a direct replacement for a gas or charcoal grill, but it gets the job done well.
customer_reviews.author: CrisRIII

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with quality.
customer_reviews.text: Screw holes did not align; used a drill. About 1 hour to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Betty white

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be more user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Can’t put on more than 3 hamburgers at a time. Otherwise the temperature keeps going down.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Tinkler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, with one exception, no handle for maneuvering.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about my new grill, with one exception, there is no handle for maneuvering !...
customer_reviews.author: Roger Allen Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for my husband and I. I haven’t burnt anything yet, which I would do all the time with the propane grill. We are vegans so I don’t know how it does for meat.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Peck

customer_reviews.title: No more gas grill!
customer_reviews.text: Best grill I ever had. The only problem which wasn't really a problem was it wasn't as easy to clean as I thought it was. But my husband order this grill mat and it is wonderful. And it is reuse. Clean up well. I love my grill!!
customer_reviews.author: Peggie

customer_reviews.title: Good product...
customer_reviews.text: Works far better than i thought an electric grill would
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: SLOW BURNER
customer_reviews.text: This grill is compact, easy to use and clean; however, it is very slow to warm up and does not retain heat when the lid is opened.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Lumiere Feder

customer_reviews.title: Needs safety feature on knob.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this two weeks ago. I have used it several times. I have two complaints about it. 1) I have not been able to get the heat up to 550 degrees. 2) The on/off temperature knob turns on if you just brush by it. I have found it on a couple of times and I did not intend to turn it on. Char-Broil could make a safety feature so you would have to push the knob in to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Ruddy dog

customer_reviews.title: Bbq time
customer_reviews.text: Best grill ever I can bbq everyday with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Sandra carlin

customer_reviews.title: Need to buy cover
customer_reviews.text: I like it but love that you just have to plug it in. Takes little getting use to. You HAVE to buy cover as it can't be left out in the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille walkup

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Keeps blowing the GFI outlet. Cannot use. Plugged directly into outdoor outlet, no extension cord. Worked fine for awhile. Now not usable! Update 2018. Bought over a year ago but after phone call to Char-Broil they sent us replacement burner and controls and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use grille
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th Charbroil electric grill. Newest design features like integrated cord and side shelves are great.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Klevay Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This grill  is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it cook make outdoor cooking so easy and fun. I would recommend this for single parent who need to make a quick dinner any day of the week .
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great condo grill
customer_reviews.text: Our third char broil electric grill. Perfect for outdoor condo cooking
customer_reviews.author: Anne C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Not that easy to clean drip pan. It's hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paint peeling off out of box
customer_reviews.text: Got half through assembly when I got to this part. Paint appears to be peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: Uroyoan R.

product_meta.title: Char-Broil 17602047 Infrared Electric Patio Bistro, 240, Red
product_meta.description: The Char-Broil TRU-Infrared electric patio bistro is the ultimate solution for patio & deck cooking needs. Offering a sleek design & outstanding cooking performance, the patio bistro features Char-Broil infrared technology which heats up faster, hotter & more evenly, for less grill flare UPS & juicier food. This next generation patio bistro features additional features which focus on convenience including folding side tables which provide increased work & prep space, cord management in the rear of the unit, as well as an easy-to-use precision control knob with Lighted ring bezel which illuminates when the unit is on. Also features porcelain-coated premium cast iron cooking grate- making cleanup quick & easy, & a larger capacity & easy to access grease tray. Lid-mounted temperature Gauge, chrome-plated storage rack & wheels for mobility make the patio bistro the ideal electric grill for families both large & small. 240 square" primary cooking surface provides grilling space for 8 to 12 burgers, & the 80 square" warming rack is ideal for toasting buns & keeping sides warm. The Char-Broil electric patio bistro features 1750W of grilling power, & plugs in to any standard 110V outlet. Ideal solution for those who live in buildings which don't allow gas or charcoal grills, but still want to enjoy the taste of foods grilled to perfection. Available in black, graphite or Red color variants. Assembled dimensions: 39.8" wide x 25.6" deep x 39.8" high. Weights 54 lbs.
feature_bullets: 240 Square inch grilling surface with 80 Square inch warming rack- 8 to 12 hamburger capacity
Electric TRU-Infrared cooking system allows you to cook your food evenly with less flare-ups - juicier food, every time
Porcelain-coated cast iron Premium cooking grates are rust-resistant and easy-to-clean
Folding side shelves provide plenty of work and prep space
Features an easy to use temperature control knob, storage rack, cord Management and easy to reach large capacity grease tray
